text: Night of Champions (2008) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE). It took place on June 29, 2008 at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas and featured talent from the Raw, SmackDown, and ECW brands. It was the second Night of Champions event held by WWE and the first without the Vengeance name. As a tradition, every championship in WWE was defended at the event. == Results == No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Jeff Hardy defeated Montel Vontavious Porter Dark match 2 John Morrison and The Miz (c) defeated Finlay and Hornswoggle Tag team match for the WWE Tag Team Championship 3 Matt Hardy (c) defeated Chavo Guerrero (with Bam Neely) Singles match for the WWE United States Championship 4 Mark Henry defeated Kane (c) and Big Show Triple Threat match for the ECW Championship 5 Ted DiBiase and Cody Rhodes (c) defeated Hardcore Holly (c) Two-on-one Handicap match for the World Tag Team Championship 6 Kofi Kingston defeated Chris Jericho (c) (with Lance Cade) Singles match for the WWE Intercontinental Championship 11:00 7 Mickie James (c) defeated Katie Lea Burchill (with Paul Burchill) Singles match for the WWE Women's Championship 8 Edge (c) defeated Batista Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 9 Triple H (c) defeated John Cena Singles match for.the WWE Championship 19:39 == References == == Other websites == * Official Night Of Champions website Category:2008 in professional wrestling Category:WWE Night of Champions Category:Sports in Dallas Category:2008 in Texas Category:21st century in Dallas
title: Night of Champions (2008)
